title: France panorama. [No. 75/08]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The environment - pleasure-boating in Paris. Minerals and fossils - exhibition of European stones. 2. Turbines - for clearing airports of snow. 3. Posters - modern and evocative posters. Despierre - from painting to medals.
